CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, pg. A14 reads: "Third Prize - Mary Louise Smith of Beltzhoover, one of the newest members of the Ceramic Guild, won third prize for her lamp in the mold combination category. "Ageless Art" was the theme of the show.  Mary Louise is an employe[sic] of Cross Creek Ceramics in Baldwin, where she works in the models department. - Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mary Louise Smith holding third place Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild ribbon, standing in front of winning lamp for Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild show in Penn Sheraton hotel
